name: Low-Stakes 'n' Half-Hazard
description:
Hazard ensures nothing : yet you can roll your three dice and get something, sometimes. Cross the carpet with your mininons, get juice (points) and roll again, and again, and again, until you feel like a winner.

TEAM : Johann Chapuy / Chiara Curto / Benoit Cante / Zacharie Chapuy / Felix Tellitocci / Bimulus Gringote
